resources.string: This service listens to fold state changes and plays your chosen sounds in response.
Used to post the persistent notifications that allow the service to keep running in the background
Sorry, we need to keep this open or else Android gets mad at us. You can set it to a lower priority in notification settings if it bothers you.

This app needs the READ_LOGS permission to function. Please open an ADB shell and grant this permission using the following command:

pm grant com.denytheflowerpot.scrunch android.permission.READ_LOGS

Then exit the app from the Recents menu and restart it. No information of any kind will be used from the system logs outside of the folding state of the display.
